name: Desktop Simulator 2021
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2021

It's a desktop, but more annoying

Your goal is to play the games your friends ask you to play, mess up and something happens to your desktop (probably). Close a window while a friend asks you to play something? lots of bad stuff happens.
There's no end goal, it's just a thing that exists

Controls:
Spacebar randomizes the BG
Esc to switch between fullscreen and windowed
Mouse left click and drag to move icons
Mouse double left click to run apps/icons
Windows are the same as icons, but only at the top (and the X closes it)

Maybe the game will update and the minigames will be playable, who knows?
